nodes.text: Island Four was the name of an island hunting ground located on the moon Wasskah that was used by members of a hunting guild headed by the Trandoshan Garnac. Jedi younglings Kalifa, Jinx and O-Mer, captured by the Trandoshans on training missions, managed to survive on the island for some time before meeting captured Padawan Ahsoka Tano when she was brought to the island.
